00045 // are directly copy/pasta'd, so we included their license too

00345 enum InputCode{
00346         INPUTEVENT_FIRST = 0,
00347 
00348     KEYBOARD,
00349 
00350     MOUSEBUTTON,
00351     MOUSEABSOLUTEVERTICAL,
00352     MOUSEABSOLUTEHORIZONTAL,
00353     MOUSEVERTICAL,
00354     MOUSEHORIZONTAL,
00355     MOUSEWHEELVERTICAL,
00356     MOUSEWHEELHORIZONTAL,
00357 
00358     JOYSTICKBUTTON,
00359     JOYSTICKMOTIONAXIS,
00360     JOYSTICKBALLVERTICAL,
00361     JOYSTICKBALLHORIZONTAL,
00362     JOYSTICKHATVERTICAL,
00363     JOYSTICKHATHORIZONTAL,
00364 
00365         INPUTEVENT_LAST
00366 };
00367 
00368 //This is used to pass information allong with input
00369 class MetaCode
00370 {
00371     private:
00372         int MetaValue;
00373         short unsigned int ID;
00374         InputCode Code;
00375     public:
00376         MetaCode();
00377         MetaCode(int MetaValue_, short unsigned int ID_, InputCode Code_);
00378         MetaCode(RawEvent _RawEvent);
00379 
00380         InputCode GetCode();                    //What is being done? This stores which code was generated which should identify the type of input.
00381         void SetCode(InputCode Code_);
00382 
00383         int GetMetaValue();                     //How much is being done? How far has the mouse moved, how much is the throttle pushed.
00384         void SetMetaValue(int MetaValue_);      //For button presses a positive value is pushed and a zero means unpushed
00385 
00386         short unsigned int GetID();             //Which input is doing it? If this the input was one of may, like which mouse button, which joystick axis.
00387         void SetID(short unsigned int ID_);
00388 
00389         bool operator==(const MetaCode &other) const;
00390 };
00391 
00392 class PhysEventUserInput : public PhysEvent
00393 {
00394     private:
00395         vector<MetaCode> Code;
00396 
00397         public:
00398         //By default codes are off,if they are on the list, they can be considered pushed
00399         PhysEventUserInput();
00400         PhysEventUserInput(MetaCode Code_);
00401         PhysEventUserInput(vector<MetaCode> Code_);
00402         virtual ~PhysEventUserInput();
00403 
00404         //code managment functions
00405         MetaCode GetCode(unsigned int Index);
00406         unsigned int GetCodeCount();
00407 
00408         void AddCode(MetaCode _Code);
00409         void ToggleCode(MetaCode _Code);
00410         void ToggleCode(unsigned int Index);
00411 
00412                 virtual EventType getEventType();
00413 };
